column5: This spacious open concept home is 'Country Chic' with pine floors throughout, ship-lap walls, large windows, vaulted ceilings with exposed wood beams and wrap around porch with amazing views! 4 Bedroom 4 Bathrooms and a Loft sleeping area with a Spiral Staircase. Top of the line appliances, granite counter tops, large bedrooms, modern bathrooms and lots of sliding barn doors and so much more. There is nothing like it in Concan!
